title: Understanding Table Expansion
text: When you enter data in rows or columns adjacent to an existing table in Excel, it can automatically become part of the table. This feature helps in maintaining the structure and functionality of the table.

title: Excel's Automatic Table Expansion
text: Does data entered in rows or columns adjacent to the table become part of the table?
choices: no, it cannot be done on Excel
yes, but you must manually manipulate Excel
